BBjNumber x,
BBjNumber y,
BBjNumber w,
BBjNumber h)
        Constructor SimpleFormComponent Creates the component by using a given existing BBjWindow
        Parameters:
        BBjWindow - wnd!: child window that the component shall occupy
        BBjNumber - id: Control ID for the BBjChildWindow, which is created on wnd!
        BBjNumber - x: x-coordinate
        BBjNumber - y: y-coordinate
        BBjNumber - w: width
        BBjNumber - h: height

      • canSelectionChange

        public BBjNumber canSelectionChange(BBjNumber force)
        Method canSelectionChange: This method is called from the business component when the selection changed (needs overriding)
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - force: if set to 1, enforce saving unsaved data as selection will undeniably change
        Returns:
        BBjNumber: 0 = can't change, 1 = change is OK

BBjNumber isLocked)
        Method onPartialUpdate: invoked from Business Component, broadcasting the change of a record
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - recno: the record number within the resultset that has been updated
        BBjNumber - isLocked: 1 = record was locked, 0 = record was unlocked

        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - recNo: the record number that was edited
        BBjString - fieldName$: the field name that just was edited
        BBjSting - newContent$: the new Contents of the field
